verses.verse: וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- from הַתְּכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> hat-te-Che-let And of the blue וְהָֽאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> ve-ha-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> hash-sha-Ni, and scarlet עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su they made בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> vig-dei- cloths שְׂרָ֖ד <S%H8278><s%> se-Rad of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-Ret to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh; in the holy וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su [place] and made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּגְדֵ֤י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron, for Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses פ Peh

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> ha-'e-Fod; the ephod זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar. and fine twined

וַֽיְרַקְּע֞וּ <S%H7554><s%> vay-rak-ke-'U And they did beat אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- into פַּחֵ֣י <S%H6341><s%> pa-Chei thin plates הַזָּהָב֮ <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav the gold וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <S%H7112><s%> ve-kitz-Tzetz and cut פְּתִילִם֒ <S%H6616><s%> pe-ti-Lim [it into] wires לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to be woven בְּת֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch hope הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> hat-te-Che-let [it] in the blue וּבְת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> u-ve-Toch hope הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <S%H713><s%> ha-'ar-ga-Man, and in the purple וּבְת֛וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> u-ve-Toch hope תּוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> hash-sha-Ni and the scarlet וּבְת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> u-ve-Toch hope הַשֵּׁ֑שׁ <S%H8336><s%> hash-Shesh; and in the fine linen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> cho-Shev. [with] cunning

כְּתֵפֹ֥ת <S%H3802><s%> ke-te-Fot shoulderpieces עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-su- They made ל֖וֹ lo חֹבְרֹ֑ת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot; for it to couple [it] together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei by the two; קִצְוֹותֹו kitz-vo-tov כקְצֹותָ֖יו <S%H7118><s%> ke-tzo-Tav end קחֻבָּֽר׃ <S%H2266><s%> chub-Bar. was it coupled together

וְחֵ֨שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> ve-Che-shev And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּת֜וֹ <S%H642><s%> a-fud-da-To of his ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, of מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu the same הוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> hu its כְּמַעֲשֵׂהוּ֒ <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-se-Hu that [was] upon it [was] of the same according to the work זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, thereof [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar; and fine twined כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su And they wrought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> 'av-Nei stones הַשֹּׁ֔הַם <S%H7718><s%> hash-Sho-ham, onyx מֻֽסַבֹּ֖ת <S%H4142><s%> mu-sab-Bot inclosed מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <S%H4865><s%> mish-be-Tzot in ouches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; of gold מְפֻתָּחֹת֙ <S%H6605><s%> me-fut-ta-Chot graven פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <S%H6605><s%> pit-tu-Chei were engraved חוֹתָ֔ם <S%H2368><s%> cho-Tam, as signets עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according שְׁמ֖וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot with the names בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <S%H3802><s%> kit-Fot them on the shoulders הָאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> 'av-Nei [that they should be] stones זִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> zik-ka-Ron for a memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses פ Peh

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> ha-Cho-shen the breastplate מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> cho-Shev [of] cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-Seh like the work אֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> 'e-Fod; of the ephod זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar. and fine twined

רָב֧וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> ra-Vu-a' It was foursquare הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become כָּפ֖וּל <S%H3717><s%> ka-Ful double עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su they made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> ha-Cho-shen; the breastplate זֶ֧רֶת <S%H2239><s%> Ze-ret a span אָרְכּ֛וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko [was] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <S%H2239><s%> ve-Ze-ret thereof and a span רָחְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo the breadth כָּפֽוּל׃ <S%H3717><s%> ka-Ful. thereof [being] doubled

וַיְמַלְאוּ־ <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-'u- And they set ב֔וֹ vo, אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah in it four ט֣וּרֵי <S%H2905><s%> Tu-rei rows אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'A-ven; of stones ט֗וּר <S%H2905><s%> Tur, [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <S%H124><s%> 'O-dem [was] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <S%H6357><s%> pit-Dah a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <S%H1304><s%> u-va-Re-ket, and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> hat-Tur row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad. this [was] the first

וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> ve-hat-Tur row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni; And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> No-fech an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <S%H5601><s%> sap-Pir a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H3095><s%> ve-ya-ha-Lom. and a diamond

וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> ve-hat-Tur row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi; And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H3958><s%> Le-shem a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <S%H7618><s%> she-Vo an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <S%H306><s%> ve-'ach-La-mah. and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <S%H2905><s%> ve-hat-Tur row הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> tar-Shish a beryl שֹׁ֖הַם <S%H7718><s%> Sho-ham an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <S%H3471><s%> ve-ya-she-Peh; and a jasper מֽוּסַבֹּ֛ת <S%H4142><s%> mu-sab-Bot [they were] inclosed מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <S%H4865><s%> mish-be-Tzot in ouches זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold בְּמִלֻּאֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4396><s%> be-mil-lu-'o-Tam. in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <S%H68><s%> Ve-ha-'a-va-nim And the stones עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were corresponding שְׁמֹ֨ת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot [were] according to the names בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵ֛נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah in שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- corresponding שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> she-mo-Tam; according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <S%H6603><s%> pit-tu-Chei [like] the engravings חֹתָם֙ <S%H2368><s%> cho-Tam of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were corresponding שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, with his name לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> Sha-vet. tribes

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su And they made עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> ha-Cho-shen upon the breastplate שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <S%H8333><s%> shar-she-Rot chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <S%H1383><s%> gav-Lut at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh work עֲבֹ֑ת <S%H5688><s%> 'a-Vot; [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor. [of] pure
